name: Spider Disaster
description:
In this cute little town, while everybody lives in peace, something happens. You are loosing blood!, and suddently you attack to other people like a vampire and, CHAOS...

When you run out of blood, you can sell your body parts in the blackmarket. 
Oh and also you can buy body parts too. Who doesn't 8 legs, 6 arms and 7 eyes...

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Dash
  • Left Click - Attack
  • Right Click - Shield
  • E - Blackmarket
  • R - Restart
  • M** - Mute/Unmute
